settlements.name: Advance Auto Parts Data Breach
settlements.description: 2024 cybersecurity breach impacting 2.3M employees and job applicants.
settlements.eligibility: Received data breach notice from Advance Auto Parts

settlements.name: Neiman Marcus Data Breach
settlements.description: May 2024 breach exposed customer personal information.
settlements.eligibility: Customers whose data was exposed in May 2024 breach

settlements.name: Wells Fargo COVID Forbearance
settlements.description: Mortgages placed into forbearance without informed consent during COVID.
settlements.eligibility: Wells Fargo mortgages in forbearance March 2020-Dec 2021

settlements.name: Whole Foods Hot Cocoa Packaging
settlements.description: 365 Organic Hot Cocoa deceptively packaged with excessive empty space.
settlements.eligibility: California purchasers Nov 2017-March 2025

settlements.name: Similasan Eye Drops Labeling
settlements.description: Deceptive labeling of homeopathic eye drops sold at CVS and Walgreens.
settlements.eligibility: Purchased Similasan eye drops Sept 2017-Feb 2025

settlements.name: Cash App Spam Text Messages
settlements.description: Unsolicited referral texts sent to Washington residents without consent.
settlements.eligibility: Washington residents who received Cash App referral texts

settlements.name: Invisalign/SmileDirectClub Antitrust
settlements.description: Align Technology and SmileDirectClub allegedly limited competition.
settlements.eligibility: Purchased SmileDirectClub aligners Oct 2017-Aug 2022

settlements.name: Zales Unsolicited Text Messages
settlements.description: Marketing texts sent to numbers on Do Not Call Registry.
settlements.eligibility: Received 2+ Zales texts while on Do Not Call Registry

settlements.name: Frontier Communications Data Breach
settlements.description: April 2024 cyberattack compromised customer data including SSNs.
settlements.eligibility: Received breach notice from Frontier Communications

settlements.name: Evolve Bank & Trust Data Breach
settlements.description: 2024 cyberattack exposed SSNs and bank account information.
settlements.eligibility: Data included in 2024 Evolve Bank breach files

settlements.name: University of Minnesota Data Breach
settlements.description: Data breach affecting university employees and students.
settlements.eligibility: Received breach notification from University of Minnesota

settlements.name: Shields Health Data Breach
settlements.description: Healthcare data breach exposing patient information.
settlements.eligibility: Patients affected by Shields Health data breach

settlements.name: Nuance MOVEit Data Breach
settlements.description: MOVEit software vulnerability led to data breach.
settlements.eligibility: Affected by Nuance Communications MOVEit breach

settlements.name: Integris Health Data Breach
settlements.description: Healthcare provider data breach affecting patient records.
settlements.eligibility: Integris Health patients affected by data breach

settlements.name: Nvidia 401(k) ERISA Settlement
settlements.description: Excessive fees and imprudent investment options in 401(k) plan.
settlements.eligibility: Nvidia 401(k) plan participants during class period

settlements.name: Fortive Corp Data Breach
settlements.description: Corporate data breach exposing employee information.
settlements.eligibility: Fortive employees affected by data breach

settlements.name: Caltech/Johns Hopkins Financial Aid
settlements.description: Universities allegedly colluded to limit financial aid to students.
settlements.eligibility: Students who received financial aid 2003-2024

settlements.name: Heritage Provider Network Settlement
settlements.description: Healthcare billing and payment practices settlement.
settlements.eligibility: Patients treated at Heritage Provider Network facilities

settlements.name: AARP Video Privacy Settlement
settlements.description: Alleged violations of Video Privacy Protection Act.
settlements.eligibility: AARP website visitors whose video viewing tracked

settlements.name: Intuit 401(k) ERISA Settlement
settlements.description: Excessive fees in Intuit employee retirement plan.
settlements.eligibility: Intuit 401(k) plan participants during class period
